about_the_game:
Create, Play, and Share your own 3D Worlds with friends

Dive into endless creativity, where you can play, create and share stunning 3D worlds together—on any device, for any device. Jump into games from 3D platformers to first person shooters together, and hit the remix button to make them your own!

Play

Play, explore and compete in exciting platformers, first-person shooters, and more. Level up, challenge your friends, and dive into unique worlds created by players from around the globe.

Create

Instantly remix any game or let your imagination run wild to create something truly unique. When you're ready, hit the publish button to release your games within seconds and challenge your friends—on desktop to mobile, with zero delay.

Together

From playing together to creating in real-time, Sceneri makes it fun to experience and create games faster than ever before.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD GCN+, NVIDIA Kepler+, or Intel HD 5000-series or newer
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12.0 or newer
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, Intel dual core or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU (AMD GCN-based GPU or newer, NVIDIA Kepler-based GPU or newer, Intel HD 4000 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Sceneri

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10, Windows® 11
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
